title: ZipRecruiter Jobs Scraper (Fast & Optimized)
description: A fast and lightweight actor to scrape job listings from ZipRecruiter using HTTP and Cheerio. Optimized for speed with parallel processing.

startUrl.title: Start URL (optional)
startUrl.description: A specific ZipRecruiter URL to start scraping from. If provided, it overrides Keyword, Location, and Date Posted filters.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Search term(s) for jobs (e.g., 'Software Developer', 'React', 'Data Analyst').

location.title: Location
location.description: The job location to filter by (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'Remote', 'San Francisco').

postedWithin.title: Date Posted
postedWithin.description: Filter by how recently the job was posted. Note: This filter only works when using Keyword search (not with custom Start URL).

results_wanted.title: Results Wanted
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of job listings to scrape.

collect_details.title: Collect Job Details
collect_details.description: If enabled, the scraper will visit each job's detail page to extract more information (full description, etc.). Disabling this makes the scrape much faster but returns less data.

preferCandidateSearch.title: Prefer '/candidate/search' URLs
preferCandidateSearch.description: If enabled, the scraper will use the '/candidate/search' URL structure instead of '/Jobs/'. This can sometimes provide different results or better pagination stability.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: The maximum number of parallel requests. Higher values = faster scraping but may increase blocking risk. Recommended: 8-15 for details, 15-25 without details.

downloadIntervalMs.title: Download Interval (ms)
downloadIntervalMs.description: Milliseconds to wait between requests. Lower values = faster but higher block risk. Default: 200ms with details, 100ms without.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Number of times to retry failed requests.

requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.title: Request Handler Timeout (seconds)
requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.description: Maximum time to wait for each request to complete.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by the crawler. Residential proxies are highly recommended for ZipRecruiter.
